titleStmt.title: A generall bill for this present yeere ending the 17 of December 1629 according to the report made to the Kings Most Excellent Ma[ies]tie / by the Company of Parish Clearks of London, &c.
titleStmt.author: Worshipful Company of Parish Clerks.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
